channel.title: The tyrant king
channel.description:
The original king cannot be these. --------------- The reaper and possessor would become the tyrant king:
>The tyrant king Neutral special goal: _kill everyone who does not need to survive_ _passives:_ immune to death and being occupied, pass the torch **Night ability one: guards!** same as current. -2 uses **Night ability two: executioner** send your loyal executioner to kill your target. Physician will be occupied if they attempt to exhume them. **Day ability: Royal finger** your next accusation will count double **Day ability: Decide Fate** same as current
If you are wondering why he has guards even though he is death immune, it is so players cannot test of he is the tyrant by asking to send guards.
I don't like neutral killers having an easy out in becoming a neutral king. The tyrant king would be fairly simple to implement (I think i'm not a techno wizard) and increase the tenseness of games.

This role has guards. Which means that unlike the NK King, it can masquerade as a normal King.

item.title: The tyrant king
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
ThePlex:

You have 3 passives, unnamed.

Being Immune to death and immune to being occupied are considered two seperate passives. And Pass the Torch is it’s own Passive.

They’re practically the same thing. The only small difference is you’ve got “guards” which doesn’t make sense for a NK King.

Besides, NK should not be rewarded with an easy King claim upon stepping up. That’s what makes Ruby’s NK King 100 times better.

I can’t agree with you here.
1.Being immune to death and to occupy are not necessarily 2 passives. Scorned’s Resolve is only one passive, and it has both. Pass the Torch and Resolve are 2 passives in total.
2. The guards allow the Neutral Killing King to fake being a real king AT ALL.
3.NK should not be rewarded with an easy King claim upon stepping up? Look, with NK kings possible it should be the reverse: If the Blue Dragon or whoever has the majority falls for the NK’s fakeclaim and makes them King with NK Kings being a possibility then the Neutral Killer does deserve an easy King claim, as punishment for the dumb idiots who voted the killer up.
